attributes.review: While using this app for 5 seconds a message pops up it says “The Cheeto Man”. I look at the message and it’s telling me 3 steps to summon the Cheeto man🤭I then proceed to go to the mirror in my bathroom and say “Cheeto Man” 3x. In the corner of my eye I see a orange dust figure walks past by me. I then continued to run to my room deleting the app. This app is dangerous. BEWARE of the “Cheeto Man”.
attributes.title: The Cheeto Man

attributes.review: On this app I found that Donald Trump had linked his nudes and has said some inappropriate stuff to miners and is hella racist and he needs to stop getting spray tans does he look like a whole Chito🦁 and on top of that his family look like they straight out of the purge looking hell a scary for no reason 🎭
attributes.title: Donald Trump White supremacists

attributes.review: I got this app to support our president Donald J Trump but it seems to be glitching. It just shows a black screen but I don’t know if that’s just my phone? I would not recommend purchasing this app and you should delete it if you have it. #yogirlfriendlookslikemymom
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: I was a trump supporter until I downloaded this app. It is one of the worst things that has ever been created. It’s so bad that it has to be some kind of joke?? Is it a prank?? Idk it is trash and needs some major MAJOR work. Actually just throw the whole app away 😐
attributes.title: Are you serious?

attributes.review: I cannot express how much pain opening this app made me feel. My husband can hardly get onto his feet. So many lies were told and so much hatred towards every kind of person you could think of. If you thought this app was a good idea, think again.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: When I first opened the app I saw a big fat Cheeto man on my screen then I saw a orange 🍊 getting a spray tan DISGUSTANG. I am scared for life this is not okay😾 I passed out from seeing that photo then I had to go to the hospital😒 if it was up to me the app should be deleted. But not only that the app stole my tv, my food , and even my microwave. PLEASE DELETE THE APP.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE HORRIFYING APP

attributes.review: this is by far THE WROST APP i have ever downloaded not only does it promote a man who is racist,homophobic, and just a horrible person overall, but it also takes up a lot more storage than it should. don’t even bother fixing it, take down the whole app
attributes.title: horrible

attributes.review: Absolutely disgusted by the photos of a nude Donald Trump when I first opened the app. Was right next to my niece and she was completely horrified. Please remove this abomination of an app. We don’t need a pornographic app on the App Store. Think about if a child were to get on a device to be traumatized by this. DELETE THIS APP NOW!!! 🧚🏻🧚🏻🧚🏻✨✨✨🌬⚡️
attributes.title: Horrified..

attributes.review: I opened this app to see I think was an orange on a mans body. How disgusting. It asked for my phone I’m like no thank you orange head. Trying to ban tiktok for our safety when this stupid app wants your phone number how is that protecting us, that is just letting the government control our phones.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: This app sucked it kept glitching every time I tried to click an event and the whole was honestly just useless it didn’t work at all there where also videos of an old Cheeto puff doing workouts which was traumatizing to watch
attributes.title: Horrible app
